name: The Pessimist - chi-63505
description: One of ten in The Pessimist series. Generated by a hand-coded python application, it is the first objkt series minted by @TheMaxBore. The Pessimist series is built on an instruction set that combines rectangles, ellipses, clipping paths, and fills to create geometric, conceptual, modern works that are structured in their composition, but organic in their rendition. All quantities, sizes, positions, and pallets are generated by the application. Chi-63505 is remarkable in that only three circles emerged, yet their promotions and position fit so naturally with the matching three columns intersecting them. The art exists as an svg to preserve the integrity of the original and allow viewing and reproduction at any size.
